code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./Login.css';import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Login(_ref){let{onLogin,setEmployee}=_ref;const[userId,setUserId]=useState('');const[userPw,setUserPw]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const userData={id:userId,password:userPw};axios.get('http://localhost:40045/api/employee/login',{params:userData}).then(response=>{if(response.data==='')alert('아이디 및 비밀번호를 다시 확인해주세요.');else{alert('로그인에 성공했습니다.');setEmployee({"id":response.data.id,"name":response.data.name,"gender":response.data.gender,"department":response.data.department});onLogin(true);}}).catch(error=>{alert('시스템이 응답하지 않습니다, 잠시후 다시 시도해주세요.');});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("body",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-space",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uC6B0\uB9AC\uBCF4\uD5D8\uC0AC \uB85C\uADF8\uC778"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"id",children:"\uC544\uC774\uB514"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"id",name:"id",value:userId,onChange:e=>setUserId(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"password",children:"\uBE44\uBC00\uBC88\uD638"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",id:"password",name:"password",value:userPw,onChange:e=>setUserPw(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"\uB85C\uADF8\uC778"})]})]})})});}
